mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EMP (E_ID, E_NUM, E_PASSWORD, E_NAME, E_AGE, E_SEX, E_BTIME, D_ID, P_ID, E_STATE, E_TEL, E_ADDRESS) VALUES (SEQ_EMP.nextval,#{e_num},#{e_password},#{e_name},#{e_age},#{e_sex},#{e_btime},#{d_id},#{p_id},#{e_state},#{e_tel},#{e_address})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_EMP SET D_ID=#{d_id},P_ID=#{p_id} WHERE E_ID=#{e_id}
UPDATE T_EMP SET E_STATE=#{e_state} WHERE E_ID=#{e_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_EMP WHERE E_NUM=#{e_num} and E_PASSWORD=#{e_password}
